name: Morsmagia DEMO
description:
A prototype demo for Morsmagia, Written and illustrated by Kiro(me >:3) (also a one man army lets go

Tired from the modern system, and their family, our protagonist runs away from his home to escape his responsibilities, an escape from reality... What will happen to our Protagonist?? find out in this short Prologue demo of Morsmagia

NOTE: THIS VN IS STRICTLY SFW so please dont send me suggestions for NSFW scenes please.

Criticism highly appreciated in the comments!!

Development for chapter 1 is on hold until i gather more criticism from yall :3
